alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 8:26AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS CAUSING BRIEF VISIBILITY REDUCTION... Snow showers tracking across portions of northern West Virginia and portions of southwest Pennsylvania south of Pittsburgh may create brief periods of moderate snow through 10 AM. Visibilities may drop to around one-half mile in the heavier snow showers, and could cause a quick coating on untreated roads. If you are driving this morning, be prepared for low visibility and slippery roads. Slow down, allow for extra travel time, and increase the distance between your car and those that surround you.
